articles.content: When Mumtaz Khan made up her mind as a kid that she wanted to make a name for herself playing hockey, her mother Qaiser Jahan wasnt very keen. Mumtaz was adamant though as she once sneaked out during… [+9506 chars]

articles.author: INDIATODAY
articles.title: Ashes: Most runs in an edition - India Today
articles.description: A look at the top 5 batters who have hit the most runs in an edition of the Ashes.
articles.content: In 1989 , Mark Taylor scored 839 runs with two hundreds and five fifties in 11 innings of the six-match series.

articles.title: Watch: Bowler leaks 18 runs in one ball at Tamil Nadu Premier League - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Spartans captain Abhishek Tanwar leaked 18 before completing the last delivery of the 20th over, which resulted in 26 runs. | Cricket
